name: @flopflip/memory-adapter
description: An in memory adapter for flipflop

scripts.build: cross-env npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f es -i modules/index.js -o dist/@flopflip-memory-adapter.es.js
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f cjs -i modules/index.js -o dist/@flopflip-memory-adapter.cjs.js

author: Tobias Deekens <nerd@tdeekens.name>
